title: Implement status bar pane (top)
description:
Implement renderStatusBar() function:

Line 1 - Header:
'⚡ ticker: [epic-id] Epic Title          ● STATUS'
- Left: ticker branding + epic info (pink header style)
- Right: status indicator (● RUNNING green / ⏸ PAUSED orange / ■ STOPPED gray)
- Right-align status with padding

Line 2 - Progress:
'Iter: 5 │ Tasks: 3/8 │ Time: 2:34 │ Cost: $1.23/$20.00'
- Iteration count
- Tasks completed/total
- Elapsed time (MM:SS or HH:MM:SS if > 1 hour)
- Cost tracking (current/max)
- Use dim labels, bright values

Optional Line 3 - Progress bar:
'████████░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░░  37%'
- Visual progress based on tasks completed
- Green for completed portion

Styling:
- Full width with left/right padding
- Border bottom to separate from main content
closed_reason: Implemented full renderStatusBar() with 3-4 line layout: Line 1 has branding (⚡ ticker) + epic ID/title + right-aligned status indicator (RUNNING green/PAUSED orange/STOPPED gray); Line 2 shows progress metrics (Iter/Tasks/Time/Cost) with dim labels and bright values separated by │; Line 3 is optional progress bar with green filled and gray empty portions; Line 4 is border separator. Updated statusBarRows constant to statusBarMinRows and made View() calculate dynamic height based on whether progress bar is shown.
